title: Authorizes the denial of renewal of professional, business or trade licenses where a taxpayer has outstanding tax debt which the taxpayer has failed to settle
summary: Requires schools to provide supplemental instructional after school programs for pupils with autism spectrum disorder.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the state administrative procedure act and the judiciary law, in relation to the denial of the renewal of professional licenses when the applicant has outstanding avoidance of state tax debt
